text: Memorial () was a Russian human rights organisation."Structure and organisation" (2018) Memorial website, www.memo.ru On 28 December 2021, the Supreme Court of Russia ordered the origanisation to close for violations of the foreign agent law. On 7 October 2022, Memorial Society was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize. ==References== Category:Human rights organizations Category:Human rights in Russia Category:Organizations based in Russia
title: Memorial (society)
